::Zardus/Prowl::

Zardus stumbles back as Sixshot's detatched arm whacks him once again. His 
eyes widen as he hears Pyro's message. The slight surprise from it causes him 
to fail to evade another one of Sixshot's swings and stumble back in pain.

"Yeah, go ahead and fight him," Zardus says to Shocker, swinging his sword 
once again at Sixshot.

He jumps backwards, letting Shocker take Sixshot, and recieves Dark One's 
message.

"Maximals," he says into his comm-link, sending the message to all maximal 
units, "This is Zardus. I must remind you that we are allied. If you would 
hold your fire on my troops, I'd apreciate it. If not, you will all die by my 
faction's hand."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl blinks as he recieves Zardus' transmission. That was a pretty harsh 
ultimatum, but they were, after all, allied. Hearing Liono, he turns to fire 
a shot at the Dietes, who are forming Dark Messiah.
